participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious about world cultures.
participant_1.background: i've been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i am 23 and i love food.
